name: Touhou Blooming Chaos 2: Chara Pack 3 - Yukari Yakumo/Eirin Yagokoro/Yasaka Kanako/Junko/Kazami Yuka
summary: This DLC is an optional playable character pack for Touhou Blooming Chaos, including Yukari Yakumo, Eirin Yagokoro, Yasaka Kanako, Junko and Kazami Yuka. Once purchased, you may use them and all their color palettes in game immediately. Hope you enjoy.
